headline: Comcast Offered A Rare Glimpse Into TV's Last Black Box, It Wasn't What Some Expected
summary: Comcast's rare disclosure of Olympics revenue highlights the misalignment in the traditional cable bundle's valuation system. Read why CMCSA stock is a Hold.

headline: AIVL: This AI-Powered ETF Still Has To Prove Itself
summary: WisdomTree U.S. AI Enhanced Value Fund (AIVL) is a new ETF targeting value stocks with AI model, but lags S&P Mid-Cap 400 Index. Read a review here.
